SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.repository.impl

Class JdbcAuthorizationCodeRepository

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.repository.impl.JdbcAuthorizationCodeRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthorizationCodeRepository
public class JdbcAuthorizationCodeRepository extends Object implements AuthorizationCodeRepository
JDBC implementation of the AuthorizationCodeRepository interface. Provides data access methods for authorization codes using Spring JDBC.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Airport Gate Management System

    • save

      public AuthorizationCodeModel save(AuthorizationCodeModel code)
      Description copied from interface: AuthorizationCodeRepository
      Save an authorization code to the database. If the code has no ID, it will be inserted as a new record. If it has an ID, the existing record will be updated.
      Specified by:
      save in interface AuthorizationCodeRepository
      Parameters:
      code - The code to save
      Returns:
      The saved code with generated ID (for new records)

    • insertCode

      Returns:

    • findActiveCodesByRole

      public List<AuthorizationCodeModel> findActiveCodesByRole(UserRole role)
      Description copied from interface: AuthorizationCodeRepository
      Find active authorization codes for a specific role. Active codes are those that are marked as active and haven't expired.
      Specified by:
      findActiveCodesByRole in interface AuthorizationCodeRepository
      Parameters:
      role - The role to filter by
      Returns:
      List of active authorization codes for the role
